Articles.Content:
Lol sorry folks,, there's a lot to do before we have anything to actually "release" as something people can use.

Rest assured, when there are milestones or possible download details to be shared, they will be posted

But,but what about a release with only jetpacks like Scott manley had???
"Soon", there are still some bugs we can't release it with. Save breaking bugs that would cause too much of a fuss.
-yawn- ( 10char )
-yawn- ( 10char )

I feel like a little kid staring at a giant piece of cake through a window. Waiting for the shop to open.

Can't wait to hang-glide into Eve!
Is that the advanced SRB?
No it's a mini srb for launching the glider don't take your kerbals up too high when they aren't wearing helmets, or you might find something unpleasant.
What's the thing off to the left of the runway? It looks like a mammoth skeleton!
That is actually a whale skeleton....we still havent found the bowl of petunias....
Bring me another!
Um... Can we play with some of the jetpacks? Please?
Whoa, the mountains, so prettyful...
I must have this winged device! Give it to me!
-Yawn- Yawning is both fun AND boring.
Please try not to over bump the thread don't need the overseers to stop by. As soon as we have something for people to download that won't ruin their gameplay we will post it

Would this mod require a new save? It looks like you need to unlock the VAB and stuff to build and fly rockets. And if you added character customization... (female kerbals, different hair styles...) I would worship the ground you walked on. (But don't delay release or anything!)

you could copy over your vehicles and use the hyperedit mod to adjust orbit to the planets you were on unless your smarter than me and know how to copy vehicle locations cross save. All of this assuming you need a new save for this mod, which i dont think you would.
No you wont technically need to start a new save. You may want one however. In any case... Brace for impact.
Brace for what? WHAT?
I just downloaded something from Spaceport. Did you really... release it?!
yes, its own thread is incoming.
Re-lease... Wat, SO THIS AMAZING MOD IS FINALLY OU- *the following message could not be completed due to the explosion of the author*
HoY- You guys are truly geniuses for making these jetpacks. I am now off to equip my mun base with them.

Speaking of bases, is there some way to refuel them? i.e. docking ports or something. Its nice having them, but if you need to send new winged jetpacks every jool transfer to your laythe base... It would need to be added ASAP.

Currently for the winged pack you can either use those fuel pumps you see me land beside in the video on the jet pack thread. Snjo made that little addon with Kerbtown. OR you can dockmode magnet with KAS to fuel it if you dont want to install a fuel pump. A new version of the wing pack is in concept right now thats being built with in-flight refueling possibilities, and a few ideas are being worked on for a docking node on the vertical pack. Cheebsta is just busy right now
